keyMappings:
unmap K
unmap J

map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map R reload hard

map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map T Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map <C-;> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map <C-b> scrollPageUp
map <C-f> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollFullPageUp
map <C-d> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-p> previousTab
map <C-n> nextTab
map <C-o> previousTab
map <C-i> nextTab
map <C-t><C-t> visitPreviousTab
map <C-s><C-s> visitPreviousTab

map gp togglePinTab

map <C-v> passNextKey
map \ passNextKey count=999999
searchEngines:
a: https://eow.alc.co.jp/search?q=%s ALC
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
t: https://translate.google.co.jp/#auto/ja/%s Google Tralslation
re: https://search.yahoo.co.jp/realtime/search?p=%s  Y! リアルタイム検索
wi: https://ja.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia
mdn: https://developer.mozilla.org/ja/search?q=%s MDN
npm: https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=%s NPM
am: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=%s Amazon
